file.name: index.yaml
file.content:
# State Metadata API base spec
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: "States Metadata API"
  version: 0.1.0
  description: "API for managing State metadata"
tags:
  - name: "States"
servers:
  - url: "/v1"
paths:
  /states:
    $ref: './get_states.yaml'
security:
  - BearerAuth: []
components:
  securitySchemes:
    BearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
